name: CouenneEllipCuts
brief:
Ellipsoidal cuts for nonconvex quadratic constraints

Placeholder for ellipsoidal cutting planes derived from
the geometry of quadratic constraints.

**Concept (not yet implemented):**
For a quadratic constraint xᵀQx + bᵀx ≤ c, the feasible
region forms an ellipsoid (if Q ≻ 0). Ellipsoidal cuts
exploit this structure for tighter relaxations.

@note Currently empty - functionality may be in development
      or handled elsewhere (e.g., CouenneSdpCuts).
see: CouenneSdpCuts for SDP-based cuts on quadratics
